text: Epauvillers is a village and former municipality in the district of Franches- Montagnes in the canton of Jura in Switzerland. On 1 January 2009, the former municipalities of Epauvillers, Epiquerez, Montenol, Montmelon, Ocourt, Saint- Ursanne, Seleute merged into the new municipality of Clos du Doubs. Category:Former municipalities of Jura Category:Villages in Switzerland
title: Epauvillers
